nodes.text: The Salient Trinity was the name given by Car'das pilots to the three Black Sun starfighter bases in the Bright Jewel system during the Galactic Civil War. The Salient Trinity included the Darkveil Eclipse and the Dual Moons stations, located in the Scarlet Dawn quadrant. The Dual Moons and the Darkveil Eclipse were attacked by Dartas Pytin's Car'das starfighters during the Battle of Tansarii Point Station.
